name: cfpt-ivato-systeme-de-gestion-des-evaluations
description: Système de gestion des évaluations - Centre de Formation Professionnelle et Technique d'Ivato
author: CFPT Ivato

scripts.electron-dev: concurrently "npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron main.js"
scripts.build-electron: npm run generate-icons && npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder
scripts.dist: npm run generate-icons && npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --publish=never
scripts.dist-win: npm run generate-icons && npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --win --publish=never
scripts.dist-mac: npm run generate-icons && npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --mac --publish=never
scripts.dist-linux: npm run generate-icons && npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --linux --publish=never
scripts.test-migration: npm run migrate-data && npm run verify-db
